alert.note: Alert for Panola; Rusk; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 6:00PM CDT until March 31 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Panola County in northeastern Texas... Southern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Shelby County in eastern Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Minden, or 13 miles south of Henderson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carthage, Timpson, Pinehill, Minden, Mount Enterprise, Gary City, Dotson, Lawsonville, Glenfawn, Laneville and Brachfield. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern and northeastern Texas. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
